div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1642 Damietta (mod. Dumyât; anc. Ta- (299) niathis), 50 km. NW of Port Said, 1894 Burial: 480 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 5+ AR Thraco-Maced.: 1 third-st. (flowers) 1 sixth-st. (same type) Cyrene: 2 dr. 1 hemidr. Disposition: Weber 5 (8419-20, 8423, 8552-3); London 3 (BMCCyrenaica, Cyrene nos. 6, 22, 35 ex Weber 8419- 20, 8423 † Weber, NC 1899, pp. 283-7, 90S. 24-28, illus. Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 10, no. 27
